1b1(mdo sde): / rgyag skad du/ Ar+yas ny+tsa ra prata brda
1b2(mdo sde): 'o
1b3(mdo sde):
2a1(mdo sde): spyod pa'i tshul na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod
2a2(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po/ sangs
2a3(mdo sde): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
2a4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
2b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das byed pa can na/ rnyog pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i byed pa can gyi grong rdal du snang ba
2b2(mdo sde): 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i ri la/ drang srong rta rlung zhes bya ba dka' thub la gnas pa ni/ dge
2b3(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun brgya phrag phyid dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gri dge 'dun chen
2b4(mdo sde): bo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems dngapa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod/ 
2b5(mdo sde): yul la tshogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sprul pa/ tshad med pa'i byams pa
3a1(mdo sde): chen po byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs rjes su thob pa/ tshad med pa'i snying rje chen po dang / sems
3a2(mdo sde): can gyi chu bo kun tu 'chang por rnam par sprul pa/ tshad med pa'i dga' ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis
3a3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad lwa ba de ba'i dran pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas/ kun tu ngoms pa dang / tshad
3a4(mdo sde): med pa'i btang snyoms kyi ye shes kyis/ chos thams cad nam 'i dang mnyam par 'jug pa
3a5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa chos kyi sprin dang / lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis ma rig pa'i mun pa'i
3a6(mdo sde): mun pa chen po rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa/ bsdu ba rnam bzhis sems can rnams chu bo bzhi las bsgral bar
3b1(mdo sde): bya ba'i ye shes dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sems pa'i phyir/ byams pa dang khong khro ba med pas byang chub
3b2(mdo sde): kyi phyogs kyi lam yongs su dag pa/ chos kyis yang dag par 'jug pa/ ye shes chen po la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten lo mchog
3b3(mdo sde): gi lom yang dag par ston pa/ sems can rnam par rgyas shing / dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su sred pa'i chu bskam zhing / ye she
3b4(mdo sde): kyi mtha' la rab tu 'jug pa/ ma/ don par shes pa chen po'i ye shes rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa zla ba
3b5(mdo sde): lta busems can thams cad kyi sems mtshungs par shes pa'i bsam pa mngon par yang dag par mgu ba'i phyir/ thabs
3b6(mdo sde): la mkhas pa 'phel ba yang dag par ston pa/ na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i gzungs kyis tshad med pa'i snod chos rin po ches yongasu
3b7(mdo sde): bkang zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phyir/ skye bo thams cad kyis nye bar 'tsho ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis rkang pa'i
4a1(mdo sde): shugs chen pos chos kyi tshul gyi lam zab mo'i rjes su zhugs pa/ mtshungs pa'i chos kyis gzhan gyi
4a2(mdo sde): rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa/ bskal pa brgya stong grangs med pa'i mthar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thug pa
4a3(mdo sde): med cing rgyun ma bcad pa'i yon tan thams cad 'byung ba/ rlung dang mtshungs po'i sems 'jig rten po dang / 'jig
4a4(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ bag chag thams cad rjes su 'brel pa nyon
4a5(mdo sde): mongs pa rab tu spangs pa/ tshad med grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pas rnam par rtsa ba la
4a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa sha stags la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rta dang glang po che mi dkar ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
4a7(mdo sde): dpa' ri rab kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab zla ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
4b1(mdo sde): bsgyings pa mi zad pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpa' zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mig sngon po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
4b2(mdo sde): dang 'dur smrig seng ge sgra 'byin ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor gyi 'od kyi tshogs shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems ri rab mtshams shes bya ba dang / 
4b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan rnam par sprul pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog gi phung po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
4b4(mdo sde): yon tan gyi gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab stob su kun tu rgyas po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub
4b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' gtogs 'dod mthu bo che zhes bya ba da/ nga / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu
4b6(mdo sde): dang / sngon du 'gro ba drang srong rta rlung dang / drang srong stong phrag sum cu dang / lha bran brgya stong phrag bcu brgyad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yongasu bskor nas lhan
4b7(mdo sde): cig tu 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa la bka' stsal pa/ legs par 'ongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri
4b8(mdo sde): bshams pa de la bdag 'dug ste/ nyan thos rnams la nyan kyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa
5a1(mdo sde): phyir mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir pho brang zlum po byas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa la rnam
5a2(mdo sde): par kun tu bltas te/ pho brang zlum por bshams pa nyid du bzhugs so// de nas dge slong gzhan dag kyang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/ bcom
5a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ces bgyi ba btsun pa bcom ldan
5a4(mdo sde): 'das 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni gang lags de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du btags pas brtags dpa ni ji lta bu lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
5a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// dge slong dag 'jig rten 'jig rten ces khya ba dang / de de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du btag
5a6(mdo sde): pas/ btags pa'i ji tsam zhes dge slong khyod de skad 'dri 'am/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no// de'i phyir dge slong khyod legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// 
5a7(mdo sde): btsun pa de bzhin no// zhes gsol te/ dge slong de bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong 'jig rten
5a8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten rnam pa gnyis te/ snod kyi 'jig rten dang 'du byed kyi 'jig rten no// dge slong de la snod kyi 'jig rten ni gang / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ni gang zhe na/ sa'i/ 
5b1(mdo sde): khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ji tsam pa ni snod ces bya'o// dge slong de la nang gi si khams yod de// dge slong de la nang gi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ 
5b2(mdo sde): gang nang gi sra bi'i sra ba nyid zin pa ni 'di lta ste/ rus pa dang / sen mo dang / so'i bar du ste/ 'di dag ni nang gi sa'i khams shes bya'o// de la phyi rol gyi sa'i
5b3(mdo sde): khams gang zhe na/ gang lus kyi phyi rol gyi sa'i khams ni 'di lta ste/ 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang
5b4(mdo sde): rdo dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang/ gram bu dang gseg ma dang / gyo/ mo dang shing dang / rtswa dang / sman dang
5b5(mdo sde): phyag dar dang / 'di dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams ni sa bya'o// chu'i khams gang zhe na/ phyi rol gyi chu'i khams yod/ nang gi chu'i khams kyang yod de/ 
5b6(mdo sde): de la nang gi chu'i khams gang zhe na/ lus 'di la chu dang chu'i khams kyi mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / mchil
5b7(mdo sde): ma dang / rdul dang / ngar snabs dang / snrubs dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / gcin yod pa kun tu len pa 'di ni/ nang gi chu'i khams shes bya'o// de la phyi
5b8(mdo sde): rol gyi chu'i khams gang zhe na/ gang lus kyi phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ni 'di lta ste/ chu dang / chu'i khams kyi snum pa dang / 'o ma dang zho dang / dar ba dang / bu
6a1(mdo sde): ram dang / shing gi ro dang / chang dang rtsab mo dang / bu ram chang dang / me tog chang dang / lus kyi phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ji tsam pa kun tu len pa 'di ni
6a2(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi chu'i khams so// de la nang gi me'i khams gang zhe na/ lus 'di la gang skye bo'i mdog gi dro ba kun tu len pa des lus 'di dro ba nyid/ du ba dang / gdungs pa dang / 
6a3(mdo sde): rims dang / yongs su tshig pa dang / des zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / nyal ba de'i yang dag par yongs su smin par 'gyur ba 'di ni nang gi me'i
6a4(mdo sde): khams shes bya'o// de la phyi rol gyi me'i khams ga zhe na/ gang me'i gdung ba dang / nyi ma'i gdung bad dang / nor bu'i gdung ba dang / 'bru dang sman dang shing dang / 
6a5(mdo sde): rtsa'i dro ba dang / lci ba'i dro dang / phyag dar gyi dro ba dang / 'di dag ni phyi rol gyi me'i khams shes bya'o// de la nang gi rlung gi khams gang zhe na/ gang lus 'di
6a6(mdo sde): la gyen tu rgyu bi'i rlung dang / thur tu rgyu bi'i rlung dang / ma zhu ba'i rlung dang / yan lag dang nying lag tu rgyu bo'i rlung dang / 'di ni nang gi rlung gi khams shes bya'o// de la phyi
6a7(mdo sde): rol gyi rlung gang zhe na/ gang phyi rol du yang dag par rgyu ba'i rlung dang / rnam par rgyu bi'i rlung dang / gyen tu rgyu ba dang / grang ba dang / dro ba'i dmu rlung phyed pa mang po dang / 
6a8(mdo sde): sa 'dzin pa'i rlung dang / phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams gang yang rung ba 'di ni phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams shes bya ste/ de ltar phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba chen po ban po 'di ni snod kyi
6b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten zhes bya'o// 'di gang gi snod ce na/ nye bar len pa phung po lnga'i snod do// dge slong phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag la gang mos pa'am/ dga' ba'am/ 
6b2(mdo sde): byams pa'am/ chags pa'am/ rgya che ba 'am/ nga yir bya ba'am/ bdag gir bya ba de thams cad spang bar bya'o// zhes so sor bslab par bya'o// gang la la
6b3(mdo sde): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i phyi dang nang gi 'am/ che ba'am/ phra ba'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang ba'am/ gang ring ba'am/ gang nye ba
6b4(mdo sde): 'am/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de thams cad da nga shin du so sor bslab par bya'o// gang la la 'bru dang ba chen po bzhi po de dag ni bdag gi ma yin/ bdag
6b5(mdo sde): kyang de'i ma yin/ de yang bdag gi ma yin no// zhes da ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi sa ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dge slong dag
6b6(mdo sde): dge slong gang la la 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag la de bzhin du yang dag par shes rab kyis shin tu brtan par byed do// shin tu yid la byis pa'i dge slong de sred pa dang
6b7(mdo sde): rgud pa dang / lus kyi sbyor ba'i rgyun gcod cing sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed pa ste/ dge slong dag 'di ni snod kyi 'jig rten no// dge slong dag de la 'du byed kyi 'jig
6b8(mdo sde): rten gang zhe na/ nye bar len pa'i phung po 'du byed ces bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
7a1(mdo sde): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po ste/ dge slong dag 'di ni 'du byed kyi 'jig rten no// dge slong dag sems can ji tsam pa gang sems
7a2(mdo sde): can gyi bsdu bas yang dag par bsdus pa de thams cad phung po 'di dag gis bsdus pa dang ldan pa 'di ni/ 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o// dge slong dag nye bar len pa'i
7a3(mdo sde): phung po lnga po de la gang mos pa'am/ dga' ba'am/ byams pa'am/ chags pa'am/ rgya che ba'am/ nga yir bya ba'am/ bdag gir bya ba de thams cad spang bya/ 
7a4(mdo sde): zhes so sor bslab par bya'o// gang chung zad 'ang sa pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba 'am/ phyi 'am nang gi'am/ che ba 'am/ phra ba 'am/ 
7a5(mdo sde): ngan pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ gang ring ba 'am/ gang nye ba'i gzugs de thams cad bdag gi ma'i na bdag kyang de'i ma yin/ de yang bdag ma yin/ 
7a6(mdo sde): no zhes de ltar dri bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// gang la la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'am/ phyi'i 'am/ 
7a7(mdo sde): nang gi'am/ che ba 'am/ phra ba'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ gong ring ba'am/ gang nye ba tshor ba dang / gang la la 'du shes dang / gang la la 'du byed dang / 
7a8(mdo sde): gang chung zad rnam par shes pa de thams cad ni bdag gi ma yin/ bdag kyang de yi ma yin/ de bdag ma yin no zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba
7b1(mdo sde): bzhin du blta bar bya ba 'di ni dge slong dag snod kyi 'jig rten dang / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug
7b2(mdo sde): par gyur pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa phung po rnam par 'jig pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po lnga po 'di 'jig rten du bstan pa ni'i/ 
7b3(mdo sde): lta ste/ gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o// tshe dang ldan pa phung po lnga po de dag ni ji lta bu/ gzugs kyi phung po ni gang / 'dod
7b4(mdo sde): pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral dab yang dag par gnol ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / dang / lus dang / yid kyang mig dang gzugs kyi 'gog pa yang da/ 
7b5(mdo sde): par gzhol ba zhig gam/ gzugs dang gzugs med pakhams kyi mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral kha yang dag par gzhol ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / 
7b6(mdo sde): rtse dang / lus dang / yid kyi mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral bas yang dag par gzhol ba ni gang ci gzugs kyi phung po 'dod pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang
7b7(mdo sde): dag par gzhol ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi
7b8(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba 'am/ 'on te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba
8a1(mdo sde): dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba'am/ ci 'das pa
8a2(mdo sde): gzugs kyi phung po 'amamig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral yang dag par gzhol ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid
8a3(mdo sde): nas mig gi bar du 'amagazugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 
8a4(mdo sde): 'on te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du bye da dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag pa da ra gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on te da ltar byung ba
8a5(mdo sde): gzugs kyi phung po 'am/ mig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang
8a6(mdo sde): gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mig nas yid kyi bar du yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on te tshor ba nas yid kyi bar du 'am// 'on te ma 'ongs pa gzugs
8a7(mdo sde): kyi phung po'am/ mig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / de rna ba nas yid kyi bar du yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on te tshor ba nas yid kyi bar
8a8(mdo sde): du 'am de nas byang chub sems phung po rnam par 'jig pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'god pa'i chos ltos
8b1(mdo sde): mig gi thu gar gzugs kyi phung po dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba 'phos pa'ang ma yin/ mig gi bu gar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung
8b2(mdo sde): po dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba 'phos pa yang ma yin/ skye mched ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing ldang ba'ang ma yin/ phung po ni ngag gi lam dang / dbyangs dang sgra
8b3(mdo sde): brjod pa las yang dag par shin tu 'das pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni skad cig ma ste/ dngos po dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni
8b4(mdo sde): dbyangs med pa'o// dbyangs dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i lam ste mtshan ma med pa'o// chos thams cad ni yi ge med pa'o// 
8b5(mdo sde): smon pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni skye ba med/ pa'o// stong pa'o// chos thams cadani thob pa maud pa'o// tshig med pa'o// chos thams
8b6(mdo sde): cad ni rtog pa dang bral ba'o// mi khom pa'o// chos thams cad ni chags pa dang bral ba'o// rkyen med pa'o// chos thams cad ni sbyor ba dang bral ba'o// dmig
8b7(mdo sde): ba med pa'o// chos thams cad ni lta ba dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid dben pa'o// chos thams ni dmigs pa dang bral ba'o// bdag med pa'o// chos thams cad
8b8(mdo sde): ni bdag dang bral ba'o// brjod du med pa'o// chos thams cad ni yig ge dang bral ba'o// rab tu zhi ba'o// chos thams cad ni chos nyid mi thob pa'o// mi snang ba thob pa'o// 
9a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni snang ba dang bral ba'o// shin tu yul med pa'o// chos thams cad ni yul dang bral ba'o// shin tu rtsa ba med pa'o// chos thams cad ni dab
9a2(mdo sde): po med pa'o// shin tu rang bzhin med pa'o// chos thams cad ni spyod pa rnam par dag pa'o// gnyen po med pa'o// chos thams cad ni sems med pa'o// chags pa dang bral
9a3(mdo sde): ba'o// chos thams cad ni shin tu 'phos pa'o// phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni 'jungs pa med pa'o// spros pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni shin tu
9a4(mdo sde): bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o// g.yo ba dang bral ba'o// / chos thams cad ni shin tu sgrib pa med pa'o// / rdul dang bral ba'o// shin tu bral ba'o// chos thams
9a5(mdo sde): cad ni nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'o// stobs chung ba'o// chos thams cad ni rtsom pa dang bral ba'o// dngos lo med pa'o// chos thams cad ni dngos po dang bral
9a6(mdo sde): ba'o// byed pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni las mi ston pa'o// tshor ba med pa'o// chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang ldan pa'o// thos pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni dbyang/ 
9a7(mdo sde): dang bral ba'o// gzungs du med pa'o// chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stug pa'o// shes pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni tshor ba chags pa med pa'o// smig rgyu lta bu'o// chos
9a8(mdo sde): thams cad ni 'du shes dang bral ba'o// brag cha lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa'o// gzugs brnyan lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni rab tu snang ba'i 'od rnam par dag pa chu/ 
9b1(mdo sde): zla lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan dang bral ba'o// gzugs brnyan la rten pa'o// chos thams cad ni sprin mi dmigs pa'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// chos thams
9b2(mdo sde): cad ni gzugs brnyan no// bstan tu med pa'o// dngos po med pa'o// dngos po dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang // mnyam
9b3(mdo sde): ba'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa dang mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag du ma dmigs pa'o// ngar sems pa
9b4(mdo sde): med pa'o// rten med pa'o// brjod du med pa'o// chosadams cad ni yi ge med pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'du byed thams cad skad cig mazang ba dang bral ba'o zhes nyon/ 
9b5(mdo sde): mongs pa dang 'khrug pa med par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa med pa/ spros pa med pa'i ba/ zod pa bsgom par bya'o// 'di la rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
9b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' de'i dbang gi bzod pa bsgom pa na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba thob bo// bzo ba 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
9b7(mdo sde): skad cig ma gcig dang yang dag par ldan pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las lhag par lus yongs su sprul to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu
9b8(mdo sde): phra ba snyed kyi phyogs bcu stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga yi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re ra yang rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char
10a1(mdo sde): gtong ba ni 'di lta ste/ zas kyi char 'am/ skom gyi char 'am/ gos sam/ lhab sgrub dam/ dri'am me tog gam/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi char
10a2(mdo sde): kyang rab tu 'ong ngo // gang sems can zas dang sgom de yongasu zos pas/ zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa'i sems can de 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa sdug bsnga
10a3(mdo sde): ba/ bdag med pa/ stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang tshul khrims thob bo// khyim gyi bcings pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs te byung nas/ ri'i sul dang / khyim med pa steng ba'i
10a4(mdo sde): nags tshal stug por gnas par 'gyur ro// drang srong gi cha byad kyis rtsa dang rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro// nye bar len pi'i phung po lnga po de dag la mi bzad par mos
10a5(mdo sde): shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa la spro bar byed do// nye bar len pa'i phu nga po lnga po 'di dag la nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rngu da 8/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag
10a6(mdo sde): med par yid la byed do// mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo// tshangs pa dang 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gos nas rin po che yongasu sbyang bI bar du mos spyod pa // de shes pas zang zing med
10a7(mdo sde): ba'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa nas tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bar du gzhol bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar de bzhin du gang yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul na mkha'i' mdog
10a8(mdo sde): gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di dag thob pa de snyims pas me tog na mkha' la gtor ba'i me tog de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs
10b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig ma gcig gis song ba'i me tog re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi sgo brjod pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dbyangs
10b2(mdo sde): med pa'o// bdud bzhi'i yul las 'da' ba'o// chos thams cad ni na mkha'i lam mo// gnas yang dag par spong ba'o// yig ge med pa'o// chos thams cad ni chags pa yang dag par gzhol
10b3(mdo sde): ba'o// mi skye ba'o// chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa yang dag par gzhol ba'o// ma 'gags pa'o// chos thams cad ni sngon gyi dam tshig mi gtong ba'o// mtshan nyid med pa'o// chos
10b4(mdo sde): thams cad ni chags pa yang dag par gtong ba'o// rkyen med pa 'o// chos thams cad ni kun tu sbyor ba yang dag par gtong ba'o// gnas med pa'o// chos thams cad ni rtsom
10b5(mdo sde): pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag gir bya ba dang / nga yir bya ba yang dag par gtong ba'o// chos tham/ sa cad ni dben pa'o// 'du 'dzi yang dag par gtong ba'o// 
10b6(mdo sde): bdag med pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag dang bral ba nas brjod du med pa'i bar du'o// rab tu zhi ba'o// mi snang ba thob pa'o// mi gnas pa'o// shin tu yul med ba'o// shin tu rtsa ba
10b7(mdo sde): med pa'o// shin tu rang bzhin med pa'o// gnyen po med pa'o// kha zas med pa'o// shin tu 'thor ba'o// 'jungs pa med pa'o// shin tu bsam gtan byed
10b8(mdo sde): pa'o// shin tu bsgribs pa med pa'o// shin tu 'ong ba med pa'o// nyam chung ba'o// dngos po med pa'o// byed pa meng pa'o// tshor ba
11a1(mdo sde): med pa'o// zug pa med pa'o// 'dzin pa med pa'o// rnam par shes pa med pa'o// smig rgyu ba lta bu'o// drag cha lta bu'o// mig yo
11a2(mdo sde): lta bu'o// chu zla lta bu'o// gzugs brnyan lta bu'o// na mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// dngos po med pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang / mnya
11a3(mdo sde): bi'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// ngar sems pa med pa'o// gzung du med pa'o// brjod du med
11a4(mdo sde): ba'o// chos thams cad ni skad cig pa'o// 'du byed zang ba dang bral ba'o zhes bzod pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o// // chos thams cad ni skad cig ma zhes zhi ba'i sems
11a5(mdo sde): bsgom par bya'o// mnyam pa'i sems dang rnam par zhi/ bi'i sems dang / 'dzin pa med pa'i sems dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems
11a6(mdo sde): dang / chod pa med pa'i sems dang phyin ci ma log pa'i sems dang / rten med pa'i sems dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang / sdug bsngal gyi sems bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du nye bar
11a7(mdo sde): zhi ba stong pa phyi dang nang gi 'jig pa brjod pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / tshad med grangs med pa'i chos kyi sgo me tog de dag la 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sems can de yang chos kyi sgo de thos nas/ zang zing
11a8(mdo sde): med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa de 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa/ stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang tshul khrims thob bo// khyim gyi bcing ba
11b1(mdo sde): thams cad dang / 'dod par yon tan lnga yang dag par spangs te byung nas ri'i sul dang / khyim med pa stong pa'i nags tshul stug por gnas par 'gyur ro// drang srong gi na byad kyis
11b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / rtsa'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la mi bzad par mos shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa la spro bar byed do// nye bar
11b3(mdo sde): len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rngu dang / mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par yid la byed do// mngon par shes pa lnga/ 
11b4(mdo sde): thob bo// tshangs pa dang 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyuro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra ba 'a bzod pa bsgom pa don ming mi dmigs/ sems
11b5(mdo sde): can mi dmigs srog mi dmigs/ gso ba mi/ dmigs/ gang zag mi dmigs/ gzugs mi dmi gas/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du
11b6(mdo sde): byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/ mig mi dmigs/ rna ba'ang ma yin/ sna'ang ma yin/ lce 'ang ma yin/ lus kyang mi
11b7(mdo sde): dmigs/ yid kyang mi dmigs so// gzugs mi dmigs/ sgra mi dmigs/ dri mi dmigs// ro mi dmigs/ reg mi dmigs/ 
11b8(mdo sde): chos mi dmigs yid mi dmigs/ lus mi dmigs/ tshig mi dmigs/ sems mi dmigaso// stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa
12a1(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa/ thug pa/ khams gsum gtong ba med pa/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa ma skyes pa/ ma bsgoms pa
12a2(mdo sde): ma byang ba'i bzod pa 'di smras so// ma byas pa/ bya ba med pa/ de sngon gyi mtha' la bya ba med pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' la 'ongs pa med pa/ dbus kyi mtha' la yang
12a3(mdo sde): dag par med pa/ mi gnas pa mi dmigs pa/ yid la mi byed pa'i bzod pa bsgom pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul
12a4(mdo sde): nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i bzod pa thob dbo// byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa 'di thob pas// / ji lta bur gong du bshad pa'i rtsal 'di 'dra ba bya
12a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa 'dri bstan pa ston cing brjod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtogs pa
12a6(mdo sde): zhes bya bas legs so zhes bya ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag cang mi smra bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes par gyur
12a7(mdo sde): pa dang / de nas dge slong drug cu tsam 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu phung po rnam par 'jig pa ci la bsams te/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgyu ma 'dra ba'i 'du byed thams
12a8(mdo sde): cad ston/ gal te gzugs bdag med pa mi sdang ga kun nas ldan pa med pa/ yid la mi byed pa/ mi rtog pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa dmigs pa med pa/ rgyu ba med pa 'am/ 
12b1(mdo sde): 'on te 'di lta ci sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba 'am/ gso ba'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes pa 'am/ shed can nam/ byed pa po'am/ tshor ba po 'am/ tshor ba gzhan nam/ 
12b2(mdo sde): skye ba 'am/ yang dag par skye ba 'am/ gang mi dga' ba dang / mi 'byung ba med par 'gyur ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang du byung / snying rje chen po ni gang na/ chos 'chad pa ni su
12b3(mdo sde): zhig chos kun shes pa ni gang zhig/ bslabs pa sdom pa ni gangad na gnas/ gal te phung por mi 'gyur na/ de ltar khams dang skye mched rnams kyang dge ba rnams kyi chos kyi 'bras bu
12b4(mdo sde): rnam par smin par mi 'gyur na/ legs par byas pa dang / shes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu ni gang du smin/ de ba zhon gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
12b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ni gang du 'byung / nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba rna mas dang / lha dang mi rnams dang / gang gzhan yang sem/ sa can gyi lus skye mched drug gis bzung ba ni gang 'byung / 
12b6(mdo sde): bdag ni stan las langs te 'gro bar bya snyam mo// de nas dge slong drug cu tsam stan las langs te dong nas/ dge slong gzhan dag kyang cang mi smra bar gyur pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa'
12b7(mdo sde): phung po rnam par 'jig pa bcom ldan 'das la ngo tsha zhing mi spobs pa dang gnong bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des/ byang chub
12b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa la 'di skad ces smra so// don gyi dbang gang mthong ba na 'khor smra ba dang bcas pa la chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo yang dag par ston/ 
13a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan las gang zag lnga rnams la chos kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / dad pa med pa la dad pa'i gtam dang / 
13a2(mdo sde): gtam ngan pa dang / 'jungs pa la gtong ba'i gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / tshul khrims ngan pa la tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / le lo la brtson 'grus kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pad
13a3(mdo sde): 'chal ba'i shes rab la shes rab kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa'o zhes 'di ltar gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan las bstan pa/ mtshams med par byed pa rnams la stong pa'i gtam mi smra bar
13a4(mdo sde): bya'o// log par lta ba'i lus can rnams la lus dran pa nye bar gan/ gra pa mi smra bar bya'o// brkam pa rnams la tshor ba dran pa nye bar ga/ zhag pa mi smra bar bya'o// nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang kha zas la chag
13a5(mdo sde): pa rnams la sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o// ngo tsha bo'i chos kyi rtsa ba spong ba rnams la chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o// mi thob par 'dod pa rnams
13a6(mdo sde): la lngar skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la madrangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// gzugs la spyod pa
13a7(mdo sde): lhar skye ba bzung ba rnams la 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dang dpal mi smra bar bya'o// gzugs med pa'i khams su skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la gzugs la spyod pa'i yon tan mi smra bar
13a8(mdo sde): bya'o// gzugs la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba bzung ba rnams la 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha'i bde ba mi smra bar bya'o// nyan thos kyis theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rang sangs
13b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la nyan thos kyi yon tan dag mi smra bar bya'o// theg pa chen po la yang dag par
13b2(mdo sde): zhugs pa rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa
13b3(mdo sde): bzhi mi smra bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi mi smra bar bya'o// 
13b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'khor smra ba med pa la rna dam pa 'di lta bu zab mo zhi ba stong pa nyid kyi gtam mi smra bar bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
13b5(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa'i 'khor rnam pa 'di lta bu'i smra ba dang bcas pa'i mdun du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul/ na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zab mo 'di mi
13b6(mdo sde): smra bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po de thams cad dang ldan pas mgrin gcig tu leg so zhes bya ba byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub seMs dpa' lagan mar ma
13b7(mdo sde): la legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis spro ba yang dag par bskyed do// leg so legaso shes rab che// rnam par shes pas mchog gcod pa// mtshan nyid thabs dang chos rnams kyi/ dus ni khyod kyis rab tu shes// lagro
13b8(mdo sde): rnams shes pa ci 'dra ba// de 'dra'i tshul du ston par byed// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa la// chos 'di brjod par mi byed do// nam mkha' mtshungs shing mnyam pa yi// byang chub sems dpa'i mdun dag tu/ 
14a1(mdo sde): chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na// tshul 'di rab tu shes par 'gyur// nam mkha' ji ltar mtho byed la// dma' ba med cing gzugs med pa// shes rab pha rol phyin spyod pa'i// 
14a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid med// bskal pa grangs med pa dag gi/ 'das pa'i rgyal po'i spyan sngar ni// smra ba med pa'i 'khor rnams la// khyod kyi chos 'di thos pa dang // ji ltar rgyal ba des
14a3(mdo sde): bstan pa'i// grags pa chen po'i bzod pa 'di// brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems can la// 'jigs med pa 'di rab tu bstan// byang chub sems dpa' rab dag cing // yon tan rgya mtsho mtha'
14a4(mdo sde): med pa// skal ba ldan pa'i mdun du ni// chos nyidi yang ni rab tu bstan// nyan thos theg pa mngon brtson dang // rang rgyal drag gis mngon dga' la// chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na// 
14a5(mdo sde): de nyid 'tshang rgyar mi 'gyur ro// mi shes pas ni spong ba dang // mos/ pa med par skyes pas na// bsod nams mang po 'byung med// cing // ngan 'gror yang ni myur du 'gro// ting 'dzin bzod pa'i
14a6(mdo sde): gzungs kyis ni// gal te de lus dpyang byas te// byang chub lam la brtson bya'i phyir// la la thabs dang bral ba la// 'khor dang gang zag rnams kyis kyang // sems kyis rtog par mi byed do// 'chal pa'i
14a7(mdo sde): shes rab snod min la// stong pa'i zhi bsdu bar byed// de yang myur du spangs pas na// mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs pa dag/ gzhan dag gi ni gnas bcu la// myur du yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur// dmyal ba// 
14a8(mdo sde): yi dgas byol song du// lha ma yin dang lus srul po// gnod sbyin srin po gtum po yang // yang dang yang ni 'dir skye'o// mi 'gyur dka' byed thob pa dag/ gal te ji ltar thob na yang // smad pa'i
14b1(mdo sde): gdol pa rnams dang ni// 'on pa long ba nar ba dang // rtag tu nang dang nyam chung ba// skur du 'debs shing mchod pa med// zas dang skom dang bral ba ste// mkham pa rnams kyis spang par 'gyur// 
14b2(mdo sde): dang ma la bskur bsti med// nyes par byas pa rtag tu spyod// sems can rnams la snying rje med// ngan 'gror yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dir ni rab tu song ba yi// dge slong drug cu tsam 'di dag/ 
14b3(mdo sde): yid kyis rtog pa zhe sdang ba// ngan 'gror yang ni myur du 'gro// lus dbang byas pa'i sems can 'di// gang gis bzod pa 'di stan cing // thabs la mngon sum ma yin pa// des ni dge slong de/ 
14b4(mdo sde): song ngo // ye shes thabs dang ldan pa dang // pha rol sems la lta ba yi// 'jig rten la ni smon 'dzin pa// sems can kun la phan par smra// thams cad don gyi rjes shes pa
14b5(mdo sde): thog mar yang ni 'khor ltos la// ci 'drar 'gyur ba'i khor rnams la// de 'dra bar ni chos kyang shod// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches
14b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ji lta bur nyan thos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri ba shams te/ nyan thos 'dul ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur zhes bdag gis yongs su shes so// 
14b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu yang 'dis sngon ma thos pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan pa na/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur bdag la thugs brtse ba'i
14b8(mdo sde): slad du/ yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa yon tan gyis dmigs pa sbyor ba rgya chen pos bshad par bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab cing / 
15a1(mdo sde): bdag dang sems can gzhan la yang thugs brtse ba'i slad du rjes su gzung bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'a' gnamar me byang chub sems dpa'ag ni ni ma 'i na srog sa kyi bu gang gi du la bab
15a2(mdo sde): par shes/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'dra
15a3(mdo sde): la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// thub pa tshangs pa rab tu dga' mdzad pa/ ye shes nyam pa'i 'gro la sgron ma 'dzin// grol dang rig la khyod ni dang bar mdzad// rdul dang bral ba'i
15a4(mdo sde): chos kyi sgo 'di ston// rgyal ba nyi ma 'grol mar me mdzad// sems can du ma la ni snang mdzad pa// lam rnams rab stan lam ni khyod ston pa// mchog gi chos kyi sgo 'di bstan par mdzod/ 
15a5(mdo sde): nam mkha'i rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i thugs// thugs dam mi g.yo ji ltar ri brtan bzhin// thub pa 'jig rten zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba/ tshul mdog bzod pa'i dge ba 'di yang ston// snying
15a6(mdo sde): rje gnas shing 'gro la bzod mdzad pa// khyod kyi chog shes pa ni mchog tu che/ rga shi nad gsum rab tu zhi mdzad pa/ bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'di yang ston// thub pa seng ge mu stegs 'jig par mdzad// 'gro
15a7(mdo sde): pa dga' mdzad ka la bing ka'i skad// mu stegs can gyi 'khor mangs rnam 'jig pa// mar ma'i bzod pa 'di yang bstan par mdzod// sa dang mnyam pa bzod pa mchog gi thugs/ bde dang sdug
15a8(mdo sde): bsngal reg la khyod mi mdzad// mthon po ma yin da ltar mtho min pa/ yongs smin gzigs ste bzod pa 'di yang gsungs/ ye shes mchog gis nga'i nga rgyal gyi/ rlung langs lta bu'i nyin mongs dgra yang gtor/ 
15b1(mdo sde): de ni bzod pa'i dam pa 'di thob pa// lam gyi me yis sred pa'i chu yang bskams// khyod kyis ljang ldag ma sred chu tshig/ klulta bur ni chos kyi char gtong ba/ des ni 'khor 'di dga' bar gyur pa te// yongs su
15b2(mdo sde): smin pa gzigs shing bzod 'di gsungs// sems can rnams la rnam grol yon tan skyed// bzod pa mchog gis yon tan 'di ston cing / gang gi bsam pa dri ma med bzod 'gyur// de thob pa yi yon
15b3(mdo sde): tan 'di mtha' yas// spyod yul nam pa'i mdog gis 'dul ba yi// thub pas 'das pa'i bzod pa 'di gsungs dang / da ltar gyi'ang bzod pa 'di gsungs pa/ thugs rjer dgongs khyod bzod pa 'di yang
15b4(mdo sde): gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen lag la cang mi gsungs pas zhal gyis bzhes so// de nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshe
15b5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gang na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'du la ba'i bzod pa bstan par nga yang dgos so snyam/ lha bral gyis
15b6(mdo sde): gsol pa/ spos kyi ngang ldan pa'i ri la sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bzod pa 'di bstan nas ji lta bu spos kyi ngad ldan pa'i ri la sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// 
15b7(mdo sde): yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di bshad par 'gyur ro zhes// bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid ye shes bstan pa la 'jug go// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das skar
15b8(mdo sde): mda'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi brtul shugs dang / spyod lam dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kun tu snang ste/ 
16a1(mdo sde): / drang srong de yang rgan po dang / rgas pa dang / 'khogs pa dang / skra ril po'i ral pa 'chang ba dang / ug tsem ring po dang / dbyug pa dang / ril pa dang / gtsang ma 'dzin me'i sbyin sreg
16a2(mdo sde): chen po 'bar ba byid do// de las kyang 'od kyi phung po kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / kha dog brgya stong du ma dang / kha dog rgya chen po shin tu yongs su dag pa dri ma med pa'i/ 
16a3(mdo sde): 'od 'byung ngo // de'i 'od snang bas phyogs bcu'i stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa'i skar ma dang / rin po che dang / glog dang / 'od dang / lha dang / klu
16a4(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin gyi 'od kyang mimangon mi snang ngo // sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dgades kyi lta ba yang mi mngon mi snang ngo // de'i tshe drang srong thub pa ma
16a5(mdo sde): gtogs par sems can rnams kyi sgra dang / brjod pa dang / dbyangs dang tshig dang / yi ge dang / chung ngu na sa dang / chu dang me dang / rlung gi sgra yang mi grag go// de'i tshe na phyogs bcu
16a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa na/ sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad dang drang srong gi brtul shugs dang / lus dang mtshan ma dang / dbyings kun
16a7(mdo sde): tu snang ngo // yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong ma gtogs par/ nyan thos sam/ nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba'i theg pa pa'i drang srong ni kun tu mi snang ngo // yang theg pa chen po
16a8(mdo sde): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong des/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas mi mthong zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang mi mthong ngo // de'i tshe na gang yang nyan thos 'khor der 'dug pa de de bzhin
16b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa mi mthong zhing de byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par mi mthong ngo // gang ni di ba lnga 'dug 'dug pa 'dus par gyur pa gzhan du na chung zad gzugs snang ba'ang yang dag par rjes mi mthong / snang ba rgya chen
16b2(mdo sde): ba ni 'jig rten thams cad khyab par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des kun shes ko'u nu la smras pa/ gnas brtan ko rung na bcom ldan 'das gang na/ ko'u di nus smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das
16b3(mdo sde): ltar gang na ba zhes bya ba ni mi shes so// mi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des 'od srung chen po la smras pa/ sbyangs pa smra ba'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba
16b4(mdo sde): soms shig/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na zhes bya ba mi shes so// mi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po nges/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la smras pa/ gnas bstan
16b5(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu shes rab dang ldan pa'i nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod/ mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bsoms shig/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing
16b6(mdo sde): mtha' med pas/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na zhes bya ba mi shes so// mi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des/ mong+ga la yan la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mod la yan rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i nang na bcom ldan
16b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba soms shing / maud la ya nas smras pa/ gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ de nyid na bdag gis stong gsums kyi stong
16b8(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rjes su shes kyi/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs pa gang du bzhud ces bya ba ni mi mthong ngo // mi shes so// de nas nyan thos chen po ngas tshe dang ldan
17a1(mdo sde): / ba ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ lha'i mig gi nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud/ gang na gnas spyod pa ni ci 'dra/ ci 'dra bar spyod/ khyod kyi
17a2(mdo sde): lha'i mig gis ltos/ ma 'gags pas smras pa/ kho bos 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis mtha' yas mu med pa'i sang+yas kyi zhing rnam par bltas na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs/ gang du bzhugs
17a3(mdo sde): ces bya ba bdag kyang mi shes so// mi mthong ngo // des smras pa/ yang tha dad par yang dag par shes pa thob pa'i nyan thos kyi ye shes gang la'ang mi 'jug gi/ bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes
17a4(mdo sde): de la ni 'jug go// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du ba zhud/ gang na bzhugs zhes byang chub sems dpa' la dri sta ma pa dang / de nas nyan thos chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa'
17a5(mdo sde): gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di la rigs kyi bu gzhan zhig gis/ phung po bshad par byas pa de na/ dge slong
17a6(mdo sde): drug cu tsam po bstan las langs te dngas pas/ tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das thugs mi dgyes nas btang snyoms shing / 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas rigs kyi bu dang thabs gcig tu spyod do// bdag/ 
17a7(mdo sde): cag ni rang rang gi spyil por zhugs shing / bsam gtan bya snyam ste/ de nas nyan thos chen po de rang rang gi spyil por zhugs nas bsam gtan byed do// de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ phyogs gtsu'i sangs rgyas
17a8(mdo sde): kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can de/ bdag drang srong gi cha byad du mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag cag drang srong du gyur pa na/ 
17b1(mdo sde): gang drang srong las shin tu khyad par 'phags pa ste/ bdag cag gi mkhan por gzung ngo zhes/ bdag cag rnam par blta bar bya'o snyam pa de thams cad rnyog pa sel ba zhes bya ba byed pa can gyi grong rdal na/ drang / 
17b2(mdo sde): srong chen po shAkya thub pa rgas pa 'khogs pa gtugs pa rnams/ mang tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sman dang / zas dang / skom rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me la gtor ba thag mi ring bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du
17b3(mdo sde): sems te/ drang srong chen po 'di nus pa chen po mthu chen po 'di'i mthus snang nga chen po 'byung ngo // drang srong 'di gang na ba da logs su nye bar 'gro zhing / drang srong gi brtul shugs dang / spyod pa'i rjes
17b4(mdo sde): su bslab par bya'o snyam mo// bam po gnyis pa/ de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' drang srong bye ba khrag ra khrig brgya stong bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du nye bar dong ngo // de
17b5(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs dbang du byas pa de sems rtse gci ga bi'i stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las
17b6(mdo sde): kyi phyir/ brtson pa de nyid kyi tshe mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa
17b7(mdo sde): la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ drang srong shAkya thub pa'i thad du der nye bar dong ngo // 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de/ bcom ldan 'das ji lta bur spos
17b8(mdo sde): kyi ngang ldang ba'i ri la bzhud nas/ de na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di ston pa'i phyir/ chos can dang chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis la yang 'jug par bzhed pa'i bcom
18a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyi shes so// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir// lam brgyan pa sbyang bar bya zhing / lam nges drang srong gi mchog spos kyi ngang ldang ba'i ri la
18a2(mdo sde): nye bar 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste/ de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' 'o dang / rgya mtsho dang / nor mdog dang / 'jog po dang / yid yod la sogs pa/ klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag drug cu tsam lhan cig
18a3(mdo sde): tu drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / byi ru dang / a sma gar ba dang / mu sa ra ga la la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la'i phreng ba gser gyi shing la
18a4(mdo sde): dngul gyi lo ma dang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / dngul gyi shing la gser gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu nas/ mu sa dar gal ba'i shing gi bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi lo ma dang / me
18a5(mdo sde): tog dang / 'bras bu'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyis lam de brgyan par sprul to// shing ta la'i 'phreng ba de la lha rdzas kyi gos s+ho/ nga phrag bye ba rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par rab tu
18a6(mdo sde): 'phyang ngo // lha de dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bka' thub kyi gnas nas/ spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri'i bar du lam gyi zhing dpag tshad bcu pa sbyangs so// lam gyi mu gnyis su lha rdzas kyi gser nas mus
18a7(mdo sde): ra gal ba'i bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bur sprul to// gser gyi shing rta la dngul gyi snying po 'phyang ba nas/ mu sa la gal ba'i bar du smra bar bya'o// 'og logs su bai DUR+Ya bzang po nas gong
18a8(mdo sde): logs kyi gnas su shel gyi bar du/ rgya chen pos smra bar bya'o// sprin gyi lha'i phung srong gi cha byad kyis/ lam gyi mu gnyis rdzing rnyog pa med pa rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas can gyi rdzing de dag la gser gyi
18b1(mdo sde): khyim gdal pa/ rdzing de dag la yang lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dang / bun da rika dang / a ti mu ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / a sho ka dang / mu tsu kunang dang / ma 'ju shaka dang // 
18b2(mdo sde): da la dang / pa ri sha ka/ 'gan da nu bska ri dang / su mar dang / a mra dang / 'dzam bu dang / m+bin la dang / mchog tu dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mngon par sprul to// sa bla gnas kyi gnod sbyin drang srong gi cha byad kyis
18b3(mdo sde): lam sbyong bar byed do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu yang drang srong gi cha byad kyi lam gyi mu gnyis la lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdud kyi rgyal mtshan mchog 'dzin to// rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dag la lha rdzas kyi
18b4(mdo sde): gos dang / du sha dang / rgyan rab tu 'phyang ngo // 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu yang drang srong gi cha byad kyi lha rdzas rin po che sna bdun gyi khang bu rtseg ma mngon par sprul to// khang bu rtseg ma de dag gi phyog
18b5(mdo sde): bzhi kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyis so// khang bu rtseg ma de la yang / lha rdzas kyi du sha sna tshogs byung ngo // gos sna tshogs dang / rgyu/ sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo // me tog sna tshogs kyis
18b6(mdo sde): kun tu gtor to// khang bu rtsag ma de la lha rdzas kyi rol mo rgya chen po yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi rol mo dkrol pa dang / glu'i sgra bsgrags pa des/ stong gsum gyi stong
18b7(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad sgras khyab par gyur to// klu'i bu mo brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad lam mdzes pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ drang srong gi rgyan
18b8(mdo sde): thams cad kyis brgyan nas/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi char phab bo// dga' ldan lha'i bu brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'di lta ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra ba dang / man nga ra ba chen po dang / tsam
19a1(mdo sde): // ba ka dang / pa ri ya ta dang / 'dze sha dang / 'jo sha ka chen po dang / ro tsa dang / ro tsaka chen po dang / khal la dang / bar 'chen pod tsakra dang / tsakra chen po'i 'od dri ma med pa/ mdab ma brgyag/ mang ba ma stong
19a2(mdo sde): pa/ mdab ma brgya stong pa/ kun nas 'od/ kun nas dri/ kun nas rnam par rgyu ba'i dri/ rtag tu me rtog 'od snang ba/ kha dog mtha' med pa/ bltar 'os pa/ mig gis mngon par dga' ba/ rnam pa sna
19a3(mdo sde): tshegs kyi bcom ldan 'das kyi don dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lam de mdzes par byas so// char pa'i sprin gyi lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyi chu las skyes pa
19a4(mdo sde): dang / thang las skyes pa'i me tog gi char rab tu phab bo// klu glang dpo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyi yang dag par gnas shing 'di lta ste/ mu tig sngon po'i char dang / gau shir shing
19a5(mdo sde): snying po'i char la sogs te/ char sna tshogs rab tu phab bo// gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi/ khams 'dir sngon byang chub du sems bskyed pa'i lha 'am/ 
19a6(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po 'am/ klu 'am/ klu'i dbang po nas/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / shaza dang gru bu ma dang grul / 
19a7(mdo sde): gyi dbang po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i bar du de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog sna tshogs dang / 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / 
19a8(mdo sde): byug pa sna tshogs dang / rol mo dkrol ba sna tshogs dang / brdung ba dang / glu sna tshogs yongs su bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das spyan mi 'dzum pa'i zhal la rnam par blta ba'i phyir 'khod do// 
19b1(mdo sde): gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lha'i bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ na mkha' lding gi bu mo'am/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo 'am/ mi'am ci'i bu mo'am/ lto 'phye chen
19b2(mdo sde): po'i bu mo de thams cad drang srong gi cha byas kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir// rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / glu yongs su bzung ste/ dmar po dang / dkar po dang / lab rgan
19b3(mdo sde): dang / shel gyi kha dog gi gos kyi char khad kyis rab tu phab bo// mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa sna tshogs kyi las kyi phyir brtson no// tshang
19b4(mdo sde): ba'i dbang po sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bye ba khrag khri gra brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gri cha byad kyis bcom lda na 'das la stod cing spyan sngar 'khod ngo // brgya byin gyi
19b5(mdo sde): dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyi phyag 'tsha/ la bar byed cing / mi'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyi ste'i phyag 'tshal lo// dri za'i
19b6(mdo sde): dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyi rab tu gsal ba'i sems kyi zhal la rnam par blta'o// klu'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan ngan
19b7(mdo sde): gyi phye ma'i char chen po rab tu 'bebs so// lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis phyogs bzhir rlung mchog du 'jam pas kun tu regs pa mchog tu dri zhim pa
19b8(mdo sde): mchog tu 'jam pa gtong ngo // gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi gdugs 'dzin to// gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma drang srong rgan por gyur nas/ gser gyi dbyug pi
20a1(mdo sde): gdugs 'dzin cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du lnga'o// grul bum brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong rgan po'i cha byad kyis/ gser gyi dbyug pa'i gdugs
20a2(mdo sde): 'chang zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du lnga'o// nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ nam mkha'i dkyil du gser gyi 'phreng
20a3(mdo sde): pa'aphyang bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ me tog gi chu bo'i char chen po mngon par rab tu 'beb so// klu'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ mu tig dmar po'i
20a4(mdo sde): char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// dri za'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ me tog dkar po'i char mngon par rab tu ba bebs so// gnod sbyin gyi bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis
20a5(mdo sde): tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// lha ma yin/ gyi bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rgyan gyi cha/ ra mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// nam mkha' lding gi bu mo brgya stong du
20a6(mdo sde): ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'dzam bu chu klung gser gyi char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ na mkha'i dkyil brgyan par byed do// sa'i gnod sbyin
20a7(mdo sde): brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dbyangs gtong bar byed do// bar snang gi gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis na mkha' la 'phyan to// bdud brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ lhung lcung
20a8(mdo sde): ljags kyi sgra 'byin pa la 'jug go// drang srong lha brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul shugs yang dag par spyod pa dang / drang srong stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bani rang bzhin gyis brtan par
20b1(mdo sde): brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dag lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra ba chen po blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir/ rnyog pa sel ba nas spros kyi ngang ldang ba'i ri'i bar du mtshams sbyor ba rab tu phyin no// de nas/ 
20b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bzhud pa'i zhabs kyis/ me tog gi snying po kun tu gnon par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ me tog gi chu bo'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs
20b3(mdo sde): so// dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rol mo dkrol bas/ drang srong thub pa'i sku la 'od zer bya ba brgya stong 'byung ngo // de nas lha yon tan can zhes bya ba spos kyi ngang ldang ba'i ri la
20b4(mdo sde): gnas pa/ lha bran brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig du drang srong gi cha byad kyis// bcom ldan 'das gang na dri logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'dra
20b5(mdo sde): la mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// sems can mi srun grol byed rkang gnyis mtsho/ ga/ mnyis dka' rgyal ba gzugs ngan 'dren mdzad cing // sdug
20b6(mdo sde): bsngal gzir la bde ba'i mchog sbyin pa// rgyal bkang gnyis dam pa 'dir gshegs gsol// sred pa rab spangs rnam thar gsum ston cing // 'gro la dus gsum nang na ye shes kyis// bslab pa gsum
20b7(mdo sde): ston dri ma gsum spangs pa// khams gsum las 'das thub pa 'dir gshegs gsol// 'gro la phyin ci log bzhi rnam pa 'grol/ 'khor bzhi dag gis zhabs la bsnyen bkur cing // 'gro la
20b8(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden bzhi rab ston pa/ zla ba bas kyang lhag pa 'dir gshegs gsol// thub pa phung po lnga 'di rab ston pa// 'dod pa lnga las skye bo rnams 'gro zhing // 'phags pa'i shes rab yan
21a1(mdo sde): / lag lnga ston pa// 'gro ba lnga li brtson rnam par dkrol// dbang po drug du gnas pa skyon med cing // sred lus drug pa shin tu rnam grol shes// sum cu rtsa drug dran ston sems can mchog/ spos kyi ngang / 
21a2(mdo sde): ljang ri 'dir gshegs su gsol// rgyal ba mnyam bzhag rab du dul ba'i thugs// shin tu bsgoms pa byang chub dam pa mchog/ ye shes sems can bye ba rab dul mdzad// kha lo rab sgyur spos dad
21a3(mdo sde): ri 'dir spyon// rgyal ba ye shes sems can rab ston pa// ye shes kyis ni 'jig rten snang mdzad nas// khyod ni mun pas bsgribs la ye shes ston// thub pa dgon pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su
21a4(mdo sde): gsol// 'dzam bu gling 'dir sangs rgyas byung ba dag/ 'di la sngon gyur la la thar 'dod cing // mi yi dbang po byang chub 'dir thob pa// mi yi 'dren mkhan khyod ni 'dir gshegs su
21a5(mdo sde): gsol// sbyin dang 'dul ba stong zhing dul ba'i thugs// se mas can nang na gtso bo stobs bcu'i mchog/ sems can/ dbul la gnyen pa 'phags pa khyod// spos kyi ngad ldang ri 'dir
21a6(mdo sde): gsheg su gso ltar 'ga' khyod kyis lo drug dka' mdzad cing // bar 'ga' rgyal ba bdud phyir shing la bzhugs// dpa' bo tshul gcig tu ni lam ston pa// thub pa 'dir gshegs bzod pa rab tu ston// 
21a7(mdo sde): bA ra na ser 'khor lo dam pa skor// shes rab dam pa dag gi mdzod cig gsungs// 'jig rten thams cad 'di la khur bor ba// spos kyi ngang ljang ri 'dir bzod pa gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das
21a8(mdo sde): la lha du mas mdun du bdar cing // byang chub sems dpa' dums bskor nas// gdan las bzhengs pa dang // de nyid kyi tshe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lan drug tu rab tu
21b1(mdo sde): g.yos so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang sems can nyan thos sam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am// gang
21b2(mdo sde): yang sems can gzhan thams cad gang na mkha' la rgyu ba'am// gang sa la rgyu ba 'am/ gang chu la rgyu ba de thams cad dran pa rgya chen po so sor thob bo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
21b3(mdo sde): 'di lag mthil du skyes pa snang ba rgya chen po'i khyab par mthong ngo // mig gis gzugs la ni chung zad kyang snang bar mi 'gyur ro// gang yang sems can dka' thub ngan pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang
21b4(mdo sde): ldan pa de yang ngo mtshar chen po thob bo// 'di lta ste/ me'i brtu la zhugs can dang / zla ba'i brtul zhugs can dang / nyi ma'i brtul zhugs can dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi brtug
21b5(mdo sde): zhugs can dang / de la sogs pa'i sems can gang la la lta ba nyam nga ba rnam pa sna tshogs thob pa/ log pa la lta ba can de thams cad dka' thub ngan pa spangs nas/ 
21b6(mdo sde): phyogs dang phyogs mtshamasu bltas so// ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis/ rnam pa de lta bu'i sa g.yo ba 'di dang / snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das
21b7(mdo sde): drang srong chen po'i spyan sngar na/ gang me'i phung po chen po 'dug pa de yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam du mngon par sprul te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / ma dag pa
21b8(mdo sde): tshad meng grangs meng pa rnams su gtor to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tshe skyong ba'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar mer
22a1(mdo sde): snang bde/ me tog man nga rab chen por kun tu gnas pa 'dug par gyur to// 'khor ji tsam pa 'dus pa dang / gang sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis
22a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan sngar 'khod do// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang ga gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das te/ de nas rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa
22a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor de lnga
22a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bza' shing grir ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de drang srong gi gzugs dang / lus dang
22a5(mdo sde): dbyibs kyis bdag mthong ngo // gzhan yang theg pa chen po la ya/ nga dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu thams cad drang srong gi/ gzugs dang lus dang / dbyibs kyis mthong ngo // mthong nas/ 
22a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal la yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis/ gang me tog mer snang ba bai DUR+Ya'i dbyigs pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug
22a7(mdo sde): par gyur/ theg pa chen po 'di dag la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin par grub/ de nas bcos de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyis/ rigs kyi
22a8(mdo sde): bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dug cing
22b1(mdo sde): rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten du 'jug pa na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'khor bzhi dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul
22b2(mdo sde): na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan par 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul to// gsol pa/ bzod
22b3(mdo sde): pa 'di'i thog ma 'am/ tha ma'am/ ji lta bu zhig/ bka' stsal pa/ bzod pa 'di ni mu stegs can thams cad la 'jug pa'o// de ltar mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/ sems can chu bo bzhis khyer ba rnams la
22b4(mdo sde): sgrol bar byed pa'o// chu bo bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i chu bo dang / lta da'i chu bo dang / srid pa'i chu bo dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo 'di dag las sems can sgrol bar byed pa'o// dad pa mi phyed pa bzhi yang dag
22b5(mdo sde): pa re len du 'jug pa/ 'jug par byed pa/ so sor dgod par/ byed pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed/ pa/ sems can rnams yang dag par len tu 'jug pa/ 'jug
22b6(mdo sde): par byed pa/ so sor dgod par byed pa'o// bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi phung pos sems can rnams 'dod pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// 
22b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi phung pos sems can rnams lta bu'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// shes rab kyi phung pos sems can rnams ma rigs pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i phung pos sems
22b8(mdo sde): can rnams srid pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pas/ sems can rnams theg pa chen pos sgrol bar byed pa'o// chos la dad pa mi phyed pas/ sems can rnams rang
23a1(mdo sde): // sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o// dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pas/ sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o// 'phags pa yid du 'ong ba'i tshul khrims
23a2(mdo sde): kyis lta bar song ba thams cad spong ba la ston par byed pa'o// sbyin pas sems can rnams tshe'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o// ngag snyan pas lta ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o// don bya bas
23a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o// don 'thun pas sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu sgrol bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ 
23a4(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la bka' stsal du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / phyag 'tsha lwa ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir bdag cag nye bar mchi'o// 
23a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal des yang ri gas kyi bu gang gi dus la dbab par shes na zhes bka' stsa/ la ba dang / de nas rigs kyi bu ye shes dpal dang / bza' shi
23a6(mdo sde): gi ra ba'i dpal de gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu lhan cig du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal de la/ drang srong gi cha byad kyis rkang pa
23a7(mdo sde): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas te 'khod do// skad cig ma gcig tsam gyis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das drang srong
23a8(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te 'khod par gyur to// de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa rnams drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ shar phyogs
23b1(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par mngag pa tshad med grangs med pa 'dir skad cig ma gcig gis lhag so// de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu/ 
23b2(mdo sde): bo gang ga'i bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das te/ de ni ri rab kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston no/ 
23b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ning ngan byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' glog gi mchog ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis drang srong gi cha byad dang / lus
23b4(mdo sde): dang gzugs dang / dbyibs kyis bdag mthong ngo // sngon ma byung ba'i thub pa chen po gzhan yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po de la yongs su
23b5(mdo sde): zhus pa de bzhin du ji lta bur gong du bshad pa nas/ de bzhin/ du nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di las shin tu 'das pa'i bar ste/ de na 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten
23b6(mdo sde): gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa dpal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod par mthong ba dang / ku
23b7(mdo sde): mu da'i glang po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas zhing chu bo gang ga gsum gyi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das pa'i bar
23b8(mdo sde): du ste/ de na rgyan gcig ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
24a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas
24a2(mdo sde): kyi zhing chu bo gang ga gcig gi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ de na me tog chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan chen po
24a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal chen po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du
24a4(mdo sde): bshad pa nas// yang steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang ga bdun gyi bye dam snyed nas shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ de na 'od snang ba
24a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ de bzhin gan gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs ste/ 'tshe
24a6(mdo sde): skyong pa chos kyang ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dang / bdud rtsi dbyangs shes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gnyis kyang ji snyed gong du bshad pa bzhin no// 
24a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin pas mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i di kun tu rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong chen po shAkya thub pa gang na bde
24a8(mdo sde): logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'khod ngo do// mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di sems can gang la la theg pa chen po yang dag pa ma zhugs pa ni/ drang srong gi cha byad kyis ma gyur pa'i/ 
24b1(mdo sde): rgyan de dag la nyan thos sam/ nyan thos kyi theg papa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sum/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas kyang mi mthong na/ sems can gzhan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de nas
24b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po gdan de las bzhengs te thub pa dbang po'i 'gros dang / tshang pa sang pa'i 'gros dag / nga bang srong gi gro 'das shing tu lta ba'i 'gros dang / nye bar zhi ba'i 'gros dang / rab tu zhi ba'i
24b3(mdo sde): 'gros dang / dge slong rnams mos pa chen po'i 'gros dang / lha dga' nga'i 'gros dang / gnod sbyin dul ba'i 'gros dang / lha ma yin dga' bar byed pa'i 'gros dang / klu dul ba'i 'gros dang / rgyal
24b4(mdo sde): banyon mongs pa med pa'i 'gros dang / rnam par grol ba'i 'gro snga ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'gros su bzhud cing / sangs rgyas chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'gros dang / rgyan chen po'i 'gros
24b5(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs chen po'i 'gros su bcom ldan 'das spos kyi ngang ldang ba'i ri la me tog gi ze ba la/ zhabs 'deg pa dang / 'dor bas bzhud nas spos kyi ngad ldang
24b6(mdo sde): ba'i ri la byon to// dka' thub kyi gnas gtsang ma dri tha dad pa med cing / dri ma med pa'i phyogs su 'gro sel gyi lha mo chen mo 'od 'dres pa zhes bya ba gang na ba de na/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ 
24b7(mdo sde): glang po'i rnam par lta ba'i tshul gyis rnam par bltas par gyur pa de'i dus na yang 'di brjod do// la la gang 'dir brtan dang ldan pa la// byang chub dram pa mchog tu sems bskyed pa// bdag gis
24b8(mdo sde): yang dag spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir de dag thams cad bdag gi mdun du 'ong // byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs spangs me gang // de dung du'ang 'khor ba'i bde 'dod cing // chos la bdag med rab tu
25a1(mdo sde): mi shes pa// bdag ni de dag thams cad 'ong na ston// kun tu sbyor ba spangs med gang dag kyang // sgyu ma'i phung ltar shin tu sngon mthong zhing // thabs la mkhas par yang ni mi shes pa// de dag/ 
25a2(mdo sde): thams cad 'ong na bdag ston to// brtson 'grus ldan pa bsod nams mdzod mangs po// thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams 'dul zhing // shes rab pha rol phyin mchog rtag spyod pa// bzod nyan thos
25a3(mdo sde): phyir de dag thams cad 'ong // gang gis sangs rgyas du ma sngon bsnyen bkur// 'dus byas thams cad 'di la rten pa med// chu zla lta bur rab tu su ston pa// rang bzhin rnam par 'jugs pa 'dir yang 'ong / 
25a4(mdo sde): gang rnams thabs dang yang dag spyod phyir zhugs// thams cad dngos la sems pa rten med cing // mtshan ma spangs la rtogs par 'gyur med pa// dran par byed pa dag ni 'dir yang 'od
25a5(mdo sde): bdag gis bzod pa mchog 'di rab bstan nas// ji ltar sdug pa sngal kun la mi gnas pa// chos kyi 'khor lo la yangakhyod myur 'jug/ srid mtsho las kyang sems can rab thar byed/ 
25a6(mdo sde): phyogs bcur thub pa'i dbang po gang dag kyang // 'gro ba rnams la phan phyir 'khor lo bskor// da dung theg pa'i dam tshigs gang 'dod pa// bdag gi gan du byang chub sems dpa' thong // lan gnyis su
25a7(mdo sde): yang 'khor lo bdag skor te// phyir mi ldog pa sems can bye bkod pa// rnam par grol ba'i blon mtshan rab thogs shing // bdag bdag zhing rnamasu yang 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing 'dir
25a8(mdo sde): 'ongs pa gang dag kyang // byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir bzod pa bstan// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa can mthong ste/ de bas mu stegs gzhan kun 'dir 'dul lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bya
25b1(mdo sde): kyi dkyil 'khor de yang de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi yi ge dang don dang / tshig brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ning mthu' yas mu med par song ngo // de na sems can gang lta la/ 
25b2(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad nyan cing de phyogs bcur yang lta bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gis blta ba'i sems can de sems can gang gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de ltar yid
25b3(mdo sde): du 'ong ba// de ltar dga' ba/ de ltar mngon par dga' ba/ de ltar zab cing sems can gyi dbugs 'byin pa/ de ltar tshim bde ltar 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro ba// don dang tshig dang yi ge brjod pa'i
25b4(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du smra bar bya ba ji lta ba der/ de phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus spo sa kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la drang srong thub pa dbang po zhi zhing // thugs
25b5(mdo sde): zhi ba dul ba dang / zhi ba'i mchog thob pa/ gser gyi phung po rje/ ltar 'bar ba la drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong / mang pos mngon sum du phyag 'tshal te/ ha cang yang mi ring
25b6(mdo sde): bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong 'di ni mthu chen po drang srong gi 'khor chen po 'di ni snying rje chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba zhig snyam ste/ gal te snying rje
25b7(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur ba zhig rjes su 'gro'o// drang srong gi cha byad dang / lus dang dbyibs kyis bdag gi lus su gyur pa de dag mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang drang srong du
25b8(mdo sde): gyur na/ drang srong chen po de la bsnyen bkur ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o// de dag kyang sems bskyed ma thag pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad meng grangs med pa las
26a1(mdo sde): drang srong gi cha byang tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med cing / dpag tu med pa chu bo gang ga'i bye ma snyed kyis// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing
26a2(mdo sde): 'dir mngon par lhags so// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis drang srong thub pa la mchod pa byas nas/ drang srong thub pa gang na bde logs su thal mo
26a3(mdo sde): sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ stod de 'khod do// la la smon lam gyi dbang dang / la la ngan du spyod pa'i rkyen gyis gang yang ngan song du skyes pa de dag sangs rgyas kyis mthus dran pa so sor thob nas/ drang srong
26a4(mdo sde): go cha byad kyis kun tu 'khod do// drang srong chen po thub pa'i dbang po gang na bde logs su yang thal mo sbyar te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyis tshogs mtha'
26a5(mdo sde): yas pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di snyam du sems te shAkya thub pa bzhugs shing / ji lta bur 'khor yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzo
26a6(mdo sde): pa 'di gang na ston par 'gyur// de nas de nyid kyi tshe na/ shar phyogs kyi namakha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa dalta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste dper/ 
26a7(mdo sde): na/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa lta bu/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po
26a8(mdo sde): khang po brtsegs pa de mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba'i
26b1(mdo sde): 'dra bar sprul te/ drang srong thub pa gang na bzhugs pa der/ bdag bzod pa 'dri bstan snyam pa dang / de nyid kyi tshe na lho phyogs nas na mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug
26b2(mdo sde): pa rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ dper na tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba lta bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags
26b3(mdo sde): pa mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa chen po glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs
26b4(mdo sde): pa de 'dra bar mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das de na pa zhugs shing chos ston to snyam pa dang / de nas de nyid kyi tshe na nub phyogs na mkha'i' lam las 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa
26b5(mdo sde): glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo/ 
26b6(mdo sde): gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de 'dra bar mngon par
26b7(mdo sde): sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das de na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam pa dang / de nas de nyid kyi tshe na/ byang phyogs nas na mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis
26b8(mdo sde): gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta steng per na/ tshangs pa chen po ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ dor ba med pa dang ldan pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so// de nas yang de'i chen
27a1(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa khrag khrig brgya stong du mnamakha' la 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
27a2(mdo sde): don gyi phyir seng ge'i khri la rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir seng ge'i khri bshams pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang zhig snyam te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ byang
27a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gang du lhags/ su'i byin gyi rlabs/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pas// 
27a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la smras pa/ rigs kyi bud dbas na/ chos kyi sgos chags pa thams cad rgyun gcad bi phyir/ da dung mi sgrub kyi 'di gnyis kyis 'khor ba 'khyil pa'i sgrub/ 
27a5(mdo sde): bo// rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o// 'di ga ste/ sa ni 'byung ba dang 'jig pa zhes bya ste/ gang mi skye mi'abyung ba de 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i 'du shes kyang med do// de 'jig pa
27a6(mdo sde): thams cad spangs nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo'o// gang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o// 
27a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gang bdag du sgro 'dogs pa med pa dang / srog dang gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed can dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i 'du shes su 'jug pa med/ 'di ni
27a8(mdo sde): gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang skyes pa dang / ma skyes par rtogs pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang 'byung ba dang 'gog par rnam par mi tog cing / 'gro ba dang
27b1(mdo sde): bong bar dmigs pa med padang / tha dad par byab med pa dang / 'gyur ba med du dang / rnam par byung ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu ri ni gnyi su med pa'i chos kyi sgol 'jug pas// nyon mongs pa dang / rnam
27b2(mdo sde): par byang ba dang / phung po skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i mtshan 'di 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang phung po yongasu shes shing / skye ba dang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa/ rlom sems thams cad bcom
27b3(mdo sde): pa/ gzugs kyi 'gogs par 'gro ba'i lam 'di ni gnyisu med pa'i chos kyi sgol 'jug pa'o// 'gul ba dang rlom zhing sems par rig pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang tshor ba'i 'gul ba med cing
27b4(mdo sde): rlom sems med pa/ g.yo ba med cing yid la mi byed pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rig sa kyi bu gang tshor bar shes pa dang / tshor ba kun 'byung bar
27b5(mdo sde): shes pa dang / tshor ba'i 'gog par shes pa dang / tshor ba'i 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam du shes pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang yang tsher ba kun 'byung ba 'gog
27b6(mdo sde): par 'gro bar mi shes pa dang / gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po'i mtshan nyid tha dad par mi shes pa dang / mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid tha dad pa
27b7(mdo sde): ngang mtshan nyid gcig pa dang / mtshan nyid mang por mi shes pa 'di yang / rigs kyi bu gnyi su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang drang po dang khams dang / skye mche
27b8(mdo sde): 'anyan thos dang / rang byang chub 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / 
28a1(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rten par mi shes pa dang / yi ge'i tshig gi lam thams cad ni gnas med pa yi ge med pa/ spros pa med/ 
28a2(mdo sde): par rab tu shes pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang dge ba dang / mi dge bar 'du shes kun tu shes pa dang / pha rol dang / tshu rol du shes pa 'di ni/ 
28a3(mdo sde): gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang dge ba dang / mi dge ba 'di yang mtshan ma med pa kun nas ldang ba dang / mi zad pa kun tu rtog pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyi su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// 
28a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang tshu rol mi zag pa'o// pha rol ni phyin ci log ste gang tshu rol dang / pha rol la rtog pa dang / 'dzin dpa dang / dkrol ba 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang yang tshu rol dang
28a5(mdo sde): pha rol la 'dzin pa med pa dang / dkrol ba med pa dang / la'ang brtags pa med pa dang / btang ba med pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu
28a6(mdo sde): gzhan yang gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa'am zhes pa rtogs pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang yang khams dang / skye mched la zag pa dang
